Finding for life

How to build this site

31 Oct 2015

First, need a github account

Follow this simple guide, do the same things.

Second, clone

Use this project overload your project, for example https://github.com/your-github-name/your-github-name.github.io

Third, modify _config.yml

Edit your _config.yml file, find the baseurl property, set the value to http://your-github-name.github.io/poole/

Fourth, visit

Fire up a browser and go to http://your-github-name.github.io.

Write your story

Go to the _post dir, and create a file yyyy-mm-dd-title.md, use markdown write your amaze story.

Any question?

Please let me know
